description:
Boundaries of urban centers, villages, and manufacturing and industrial centers.
There is a hierarchy of urban villages.  The uvmfg_polygon is the smallest units and the uvmg_region_uc is the next level up.  For example, downtown is made up of five urban center villages, but it is one urban center.  This dataset potentially changes annually through an amendment process.  Unfortunately the timing of that is not always predictable.

name: Urban Villages
